page.content:
Activity: Share your ideas for improving your program’s confidentiality procedures

Please take a moment to reflect on your organization’s confidentiality procedures, in comparison to what we have just discussed. Based on what you have learned so far in this course, how might you improve, add to, or change those procedures and/or how they are carried out?

Please share your ideas and read other teachers’ responses in the LINCS Disabilities in Adult Education Group before moving on.

 

When you have finished posting your reflections, continue on to the Conclusion.
